TEXT.FORM: ﻿iʑora, nɤkinɯ, iɕqha nɯ, ʁdɯrɟɤt nɯra alo sɤrndzu cho tatshi ra kɯ sɤŋupɯ tú-wɣ-sɤrmi-j ŋu. tɕe sɤŋupɯ, tatshi chondɤre sɤrndzu nɯra tɕe tɕɤphɯ. tsuku tɕhɤphɯ tu-ti-nɯ, tsuku kɯ tɕɤphɯ tu-ti-nɯ ŋu. ʁnaʁna tu-kɯ-nɯ-t-ti ɕti. roŋba ra kɯ tɕe, tɕe roŋba ra kɯ tɕe, tɕendɤre ʁdɯrɟɤt, sɤrndzu, tatshi nɯnɯra, nɤki xiang χsɯm nɯnɯ tɕɤphɯ tu-ti-nɯ ŋu. tɕhaphu ra tu-nɯ-ti-nɯ ŋu. tɕe nɯnɯ, iʑora nɯ tɕɤphɯ tú-wɣ-sɤri-j ŋu, alo iʑo ʑo ɯ-ŋgɯz ri tɕe sɤrndzu cho tatshi ra kɯ sɤŋupɯ tu-nɯ-ti-nɯ tɕe, ʁdɯrɟɤt ra sɤŋupɯ tú-wɣ-sɤrmi-j ŋu. alo tshuβdɯn pɕoʁ nɯra kɯ, stɤtpa nɯra kɯ tɕe iʑora kɯ, nɤki, tshuβdɯn ɕaŋlo nɯra stɤtpapɯ tu-ti-j ŋu. ʑara kɯ tɕe, iʑora nɯ tɕɤphɯpɯ nɯra lonba "athipɯ" tu-ti-nɯ ŋu. tɕe ʑarastaka i-rmi mɤ-naχtɕɯɣ.
